content: you can make the headband customizable for all sizes just add or remove 4 row repeat this pattern has 3 different sizes s m l but you can make any size keep in mind when measuring for customize after repeats you will still need to add 3 more row of repeat only before starting the other tie tip see pic 2 to help you see pattern repeat  you are welcome to use any weight/fibre yarn but you might need to adjust hook size or add/remove repeats on pattern  the number in front of a stitch for example 4dc refers to the amount of stitches in same stitch  a diagram for the pattern repeats is provided below to help you guide through the written pattern  the numbers on the diagram/chart and pic 3 corresponds with the row numbers in the written pattern ©copyright 2023 ana luísa
